ComicInfo.Summary: In a world filled with super-heroes, one man stands apart, Neuron, once known as Bernard Jaeger, the man responsible for saving the world, most particularly from the KHR Syndrome. But it was this very plague which began to change the world forever, filling its population of super heroes with a deadly new hunger - a hunger for human flesh! With this knowledge, explore the world of Dynamite Entertainment's Super-Zombies, the exciting new series from writers Marc (Spider-Man) Guggenheim and Vince Gonzales, and artist Mel (RED SONJA) Rubi! SUPER-ZOMBIES is THE Comic Book Entertainment event of 2009! Featuring covers by Rubi and Dynamite exclusive artist Fabiano Neves!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-06 19:10:02. [CVDB155475]
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Fabiano Neves, Mel Rubi, Vinicius Andrade
ComicInfo.Characters: Ambient, Jovian, Lasher, Major Mach, Nano, Neuron, Novalis, Oneshot, Promethean, Radiant, Slammer, Spire, The Solid Citizen, Tillie McManus, Trilogy
